akn:section.akn:heading: Postal Service program for other Government agencies

akn:content.akn:p: § 3704. Postal Service program for other Government agencies The Postal Service may establish a program to provide property and nonpostal services to other Government agencies within the meaning of section 411, but only if such program provides a net contribution to the Postal Service, defined as reimbursement that covers at least 100 percent of the costs attributable for property and nonpostal services provided by the Postal Service in each year to such agencies. (Added Pub. L. 117–108, title I, § 103(a)(1), Apr. 6, 2022, 136 Stat. 1142.)
